Text:
Hi KeeyBee,

Thanks for the Searchers upload.  Nice sound on this disc. Hits in stereo and others in mono and stereo.

Beatle Tom

@ BeatleTom: Thanks for your comment. I've seen your comments on other of my torrents and it's appreciated. Nice to get some feed-back.
@ tifon, thanks to you too. 
Comments give energy to keep on uploading.

Hi Kee,

We love oldies out here in cyber land.  If you haven't already done so, you should check out
Demonoid.  That's where people will appreciate
your uploads more.  They really like:  FLAC, oldies, audiophile, 50's - 80's, vinyl transfers, 
artwork, feedback, etc.

BT
